Class Tetromino

java.lang.Object
  Tetromino

 class Tetromino
extends java.lang.Object

Tetromino class presents a piece consisting from 4 squares. A piece is selected randomly from 7 different shapes. The piece can then be drawn on a board, moved and rotated. A piece can be "retired" to place it on a board.
